doc.field: - MarCor Development Co Inc said it expects to post a profit for its fiscal year ended February 28 of about two mln dlrs, compared to a year earlier loss of 3.2 mln dlrs. During the prior year the company operated as F and M Importing, a publicly-held wholesale food distributor. During March last year privately-held Marcor acquired a controlling interest in F and M Importing, divested the food business, renamed the company and began operating as a real estate investment and service company.
